short_summary: site preparation, site facilities provision, site facilities operation, fill and grade for drainage, waste
description: back filling project located at watson lake airport
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: EZ897-240680 – Phase 1 Airport AEC 1 Backfilling**
===========================================================================

**Identification**
---------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS4266820405-Doc4266852597
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-10-19
*   **Amendment Date:** 2023-10-30
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-10T14:00:00
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4266820405

**Project Overview**
-------------------

Canada is soliciting a contractor to perform site preparation, site facilities provision, and site facilities operation for the backfilling project at Watson Lake Airport, Yukon.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The selected contractor shall be responsible for the following tasks:

*   Site preparation, including fill and grade for drainage
*   Waste oversize debris removal
*   Re-vegetation of the construction area and ditches
*   Site restoration

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   **Procurement Category:** CNST (Construction and Technical Services)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Start Date:** 2023-11-24
*   **End Date:** 2024-01-31

**Eligibility and Contacts**
---------------------------

*   **Trade Agreements:** The bid is open to suppliers who are entitled to participate under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions:** Suppliers are limited to those based in Yukon
*   **Contact Information:**

    *   Kelly Bryan, SPAC/PSPC: kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Access to Bid Documents**
---------------------------

The contract documents may be accessed through Ariba website ([https://discovery.ariba.com](https://discovery.ariba.com)). Prospective bidders must respond to this tender by the closing date and time specified above.

By submitting a bid, contractors acknowledge that they have read, understood, and will comply with the terms and conditions contained in the bid documents.

**Note**
----

This tender is closed to bids. No further responses will be accepted.

Please contact Kelly Bryan (kelly.bryan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any inquiries.  **End**.  in response to the government tender announcement for EZ897-240680 – Phase 1 Airport
